bibl.title: Heliodoros's "Sources": Intertextuality, Paternity, and the Nile River in the Aithiopika. Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.seg: ELMER David F., Heliodoros's "Sources": Intertextuality, Paternity, and the Nile River in the Aithiopika. Avec résumé en anglais.
The connection between the figure of the Nile and the novel's self-conscious manipulation of its literary models.
